Blogs

Hampi

Hampi, an UNESCO heritage site in southern part of India, possesses one of the most ancient ruins of the world. I have been to this place more than 15 times and everytime I saw something new. You can climb up Mantunga Hills and watch the most beautiful sunset of your life. You can also swim in Tughabandra river or Sanapur Lake, and you wouldn't know where the time has gone by.

Peniscola

The place where Khaleese bought her all slaves from - Mereen of Game of Thrones. This place situated on the shore of Mediterranean Sea takes you back in time and forces you to think about the things from 500 years old perspective. If you are a sea and history lover, a perfect place to spend 2-3 days
